FuncDecl.Name: GetCurrentTheme
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the current theme style factory object. The default theme is <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::win7::Win7Theme@s:vl.presentation.win7.Win7Theme" /></links>. Call <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::theme::SetCurrentTheme(* ITheme)@s:vl.presentation.theme.SetCurrentTheme(^ ITheme)" /></links> to change the default theme.</summary> <returns>The current theme style factory object.</returns> </Document>
